title: "Omfg cait is so oppressive riot nerf her!"
body:
Then they absolutely gut her.
They nerfed her and THEN her core item.
Meanwhile ezreal breaks something every season but that's okay!

replies.body:
Thats why i dont understand these boards. They keep complaining ''nerf zeal items make them more expensive'' so MF and the lethality users can be even MORE busted.

?...
Actually wow. That put a whole new perspective on the zeal situation for me. I personally think theyre fine but wow, thats something.

as a Cait otp with 350K points, whenever i attempt to play her, i feel like ive (head)shot myself and my team in the foot in champ select. I feel like i do absolutely NO damage early. Then late game, since shes balanced around what her early game is supposed to be, her dps is meh in teamfights
Honestly so much this lol. But ill get downvoted to oblivion bc idk
She still can headshit  crit you lvl 7 for 450 hp but yeah she is the less strong adc i think atm
I remember ezreal was like 100 hp~ and I flash headshotted him for 90 damage lv 4.... was kinda.. depressing
*headshot yourself* An ally has been slain
Thats not even mathematically possible. shed have to have like 200+ AD because she has no items to improve her headshot passive. she starts with 50% her AD with no items. soooo.

"Every season"
Want to list them out?

Runeglaive
Jg ezreal
Klepto ezreal
Pretty sure iceborn gauntlent got nerfed bc of him too
Pretty sure sword of the occult got deleted partially bc of him too..
{{champion:51}}, and {{champion:222}} are trash tier right now.
Cait isn't oppressive, the entire ADC class is. Cait by herself isn't an issue really.
**Quotes** As in what people have said
Oh I know, I just want people to know that Cait. isn't oppressive. I fully support what you're saying.

Caitlyn is my second-most played ADC and I thank Disney everyday that shes been gutted out of the meta. 

As long as her kit functions in the way that it does her numbers have to be on the dumpster or else she becomes insane, just like Vayne, Twitch, MF, Lucian, Ezreal etc.

> [{quoted}](name=Attticus Finch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gqBfEOAV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-12-29T04:52:11.268+0000)
>
> Caitlyn is my second-most played ADC and I thank Disney everyday that shes been gutted out of the meta. 
> 
> As long as her kit functions in the way that it does her numbers have to be on the dumpster or else she becomes insane, just like Vayne, Twitch, MF, Lucian, Ezreal etc.

You can negate Most of Caitlyns damage with {{item:3047}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3110}} any two in combination are amazing against her and Jinx since she is 100% auto based.

Meanwhile you cannot negate  {{champion:67}}  and is actually common to see 1700 true damage and 800 basic damage in death recap. ^_^

If you honestly prefer a twitch Vayne MF ezreal meta then you arent doing much experienced imo.
I agree, make Cait great again!
